nodes.text: The Vendusii sector was a sector located in the Trailing Sectors region of the galaxy's Mid Rim. By the year 0 ABY, the Vendusii sector bordered the Lambda sector Coreward, and the Herdessa and Daimar sectors spinward, while sharing the trailing border with the Far Xandil and Ryndellian sectors. Together with the Daimar and Ryndellian sectors, the Vendusii sector formed the Mid Rim's Rimward border, neighboring the Cadavine, Kibilini, and Karthakk sectors of the Outer Rim.

The Vendusii sector contained the Haluria system, home to the creatures known as Halurian ice-boars, as well as the Vendusii system, the origin point of the Vendusii Crystal mineral. The Llanic Spice Run hyperlane passed through the sector close to its border with the Daimar sector.

The Vendusii sector was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas. The sector was depicted on a map designed by Modi and published in the 2012 StarWars.com article The Essential Atlas Extra: Sectors of the Mid Rim.
